content: this grumpy kitty loves his little hat but forgot to tell his face materials yarn dk crochet hook 3 mm safety eyes 6 mm stuffing tapestry needle the cat including the hat is going to measure 16 cm / 6 3 inch approx and without the hat 11 cm / 4 3 inch available in english here https //hisheepok blogspot com/2025/01/grumpy-cat html on youtube https //youtu be/pem7xk9xlcg
